parse: Verb - Aorist Optative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Adverb from the base of pou; an interrogative particle of manner; in what way?; also as exclamation, how much!

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) of time: still, yet, even now, (b) of degree: even, further, more, in addition. Perhaps akin to etos; 'yet, ' still.
